repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: The text deals with the every day rituals and the chapters are divided according to the rituals. The printed edition of this text is available only in Telugu script. 12 folio are blank after folio 65. After the folio 65, folio are not numbered and hence it is difficult to say if any folio are missing or the text is left incomplete. Number 59 in roman in pink chalk. Some text is carved on blank folio but is without ink and not legible.

msItem.title: Āhnikam
msItem.author: Gopāladeśika
msItem.incipit: 1v 1 śrīmateśrīnivāsāyatīndramahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate gopāladeśikamahāguravenamaḥ 1v 2 śrīmate vedāntamahāguravenamaḥ śrīmatebhagavadrāmānujāyanamaḥ śrīyal̥bhyāṃ 1v 3 namaḥ nikṣepaśāstrajaladhīnaṃ bhītaḥ pragṛhyacintāmaṇiṃ śaraṇabhāk
msItem.explicit: xv 10 vitravil̥gaśayanmamal̥ śca .. ṣaṣa . śaṃkhacakragadāpadmakhaḍgaśārṅgabalamusalāni sapta indrādyaṣṭadevatān xv 11 satvān tatastviṣṭaṃ mataṃ ?tvāṃ

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin of the verso of the folio. Foliation is not continues. Folio are not numbered after 65v.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ gopāladeśikaānhikaraktam is written on 1v in the left margin.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words and question mark is used for illegible word.

TEI.text:
1v 1 śrīmateśrīnivāsāyatīndramahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate gopāladeśikamahāguravenamaḥ 1v 2 śrīmate vedāntamahāguravenamaḥ śrīmatebhagavadrāmānujāyanamaḥ śrīyal̥bhyāṃ 1v 3 namaḥ nikṣepaśāstrajaladhīnaṃ bhītaḥ pragṛhyacintāmaṇiṃ śaraṇabhāk
xv 10 vitravil̥gaśayanmamal̥ śca .. ṣaṣa . śaṃkhacakragadāpadmakhaḍgaśārṅgabalamusalāni sapta indrādyaṣṭadevatān xv 11 satvān tatastviṣṭaṃ mataṃ ?tvāṃ
